title-group.article-title: A SCALED CENTRAL PATH FOR LINEAR PROGRAMMING

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: Interior point methods are very efficient methods for solving large scale linear programming problems. The central path plays a very important role in interior point methods. In this paper we propose a new central path, which scales the variables. Thus it has the advantage of forcing the path to have roughly the same distance from each active constraint boundary near the solution.
